about.summary: A Python Slugify application that handles Unicode

name: python-slugify
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "python-slugify" %}
{% set version = "1.2.1" %}
{% set sha256 = "501182ec738cc8b743ae5c76c183f4427187ef016257f062b3fa594f60916e34" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 1
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt
  entry_points:
    - slugify = slugify.slugify:main

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools

  run:
    - python
    - unidecode >=0.04.16

test:
  imports:
    - slugify

about:
  home: https://github.com/un33k/python-slugify
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'A Python Slugify application that handles Unicode'
  dev_url: https://github.com/un33k/python-slugify

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - proinsias

about.summary: A Python Slugify application that handles Unicode
